body.title: Get in Touch
body.subtitle: Have questions or need assistance with OpenObserve? We're here to help you get the most out of your observability platform.

options.title: GitHub Discussions
options.description: Ask questions, report issues, and contribute to the development of OpenObserve through GitHub Discussions.

posts.title: Introducing OpenObserve v0.5.0 with Enhanced Performance
posts.author: OpenObserve Team
posts.excerpt: We're excited to announce the release of OpenObserve v0.5.0 with significant performance improvements and new features.

posts.title: How to Set Up Distributed Tracing with OpenObserve
posts.author: Jane Smith
posts.excerpt: Learn how to implement distributed tracing in your microservices architecture using OpenObserve.

posts.title: Optimizing Log Storage Costs with OpenObserve
posts.author: John Doe
posts.excerpt: Discover strategies to reduce your observability costs while maintaining comprehensive visibility into your systems.
